parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Specifies a JavaScript function func, for a JSON-P response. When provided, results are wrapped as `callback(data)`, and the returned MIME type is application/javascript. This causes the caller to automatically run the func with the JSON results as its argument.

methods.description: Return relevance-based results from search queries

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of query results to return

parameters.name: totalOnly
parameters.description: Request total only; do not return hits

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Specifies a JavaScript function func, for a JSON-P response. When provided, results are wrapped as `callback(data)`, and the returned MIME type is application/javascript. This causes the caller to automatically run the func with the JSON results as its argument.

responses.description: The result of a organic search request

methods.description: Scrape search results from Internet Archive, allowing a scrolling cursor

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of query results to return

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for scrolling (used for subsequent calls)

parameters.name: totalOnly
parameters.description: Request total only; do not return hits

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Specifies a JavaScript function func, for a JSON-P response. When provided, results are wrapped as `callback(data)`, and the returned MIME type is application/javascript. This causes the caller to automatically run the func with the JSON results as its argument.

responses.description: The result of a scrape request

apiDescription: API for Internet Archive's Search-related services
